title: Semrush Local
content:
Semrush Local

Semrush Local is dedicated to helping local businesses and agencies grow by gaining and retaining loyal customers with less effort. We provide businesses the tools and data they need to attract more clients and scale their business.

Local serves any business with a physical location (whether it’s one or 1000 locations) or serving specific localities that rely on local customers.

How Can It Help You?

The suite includes several tools that can help businesses to:

Gain greater visibility, creating more opportunities for sales. Be found in all top directories in your area by placing your current optimized business name, address, and phone on 150+ global directories for visibility across search engines, maps, apps, and aggregators.
Engage your customers by promptly monitoring and responding to reviews in top directories, and take the necessary actions to improve your reputation with well-timed responses.
Stay ahead of local competitors by monitoring your Google Maps rankings, ratings, reviews, and where to improve to beat local competitors.
What does it include?

The Semrush Local suite of tools gives you complete access to the following solutions:

GBP Optimization:  Supercharge your Google Business Profile — and local rankings. Seamlessly connect your GBP to Semrush Local and manage all your business information from one central location. Get valuable data insights, receive custom recommendations, and create GBP posts with the help of AI to attract more customers and more.
Listing Management:  Distribute your business data automatically to the most authoritative directories (70+ for the US, 40+ for other countries) and even make it voice search ready, automatically distributing the information to Amazon Alexa, Apple, Bing, and Google. Keep control over your business across all directories.
Review Management: Monitor online customer reviews across the web and manage them from one place. Get notified about negative mentions. Plus, keep an eye on your competitors' review profiles on Google: analyze their number of reviews and reply rates.
Map Rank Tracker: Track local rankings displayed in a heatmap around your target area, and ranking changes over time. Get recommendations on rankings improvement.

The following Semrush Core tools can also help you achieve the best local SEO results:

Position Tracking: Monitor keywords and rankings on a ZIP code level and in local packs. Stay on top of changes in position and keep an eye on your competitors.
Site Audit: Identify your website’s technical issues that could be impacting Google’s ability to find your web pages. See how much of your website is using any markups.
On Page SEO Checker: Optimize your website pages to help them rank higher on organic search results. Ranking well organically improves your chances of ranking in the local pack. 

Semrush Local suite of tools can be added to your Semrush subscription or purchased separately as a standalone option. The offering is available per location. If you have two or more locations of your business, you need to buy a limit for each location.

To find out more, please check the Semrush Local Pricing and Plans Knowledge Base article. 

To start using Semrush Local, you will need to set up your location (after you subscribe to the tool). You can find out more about the setup process here and follow your progress in the Local Dashboard.  Find more information about local marketing tools on Semrush here.
